title: Prime Day device deals are live - $24.99 Echo Dot, $99 TVs, $17.99 Fire TV Stick
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Record-low Prime Day deals on Amazon's best-selling devices
article: Amazon Prime Day has arrived, which means epic deals on its own devices, including the Echo Dot, Fire TV Stick, tablets, security cameras, and so much more. We've picked out the 20 can't-be-missed bargains below so you can bag that smart home device you've wanted at a record-low Prime Day price.

Some stars from today's Prime Day sale include Amazon's latest Echo Dot on sale for a record-low price of $24.99 (was $49.99) an impressive $80 discount on the 2021 Fire HD 10 tablet and the all-new Ring Doorbell on sale for an all-time low price of $44.99 (was $59.99). If you're looking for Prime Day prices on TVs and streaming devices, Amazon has the budget Fire TV Stick Lite discounted down to only $17.99 (was $29.99) and you can snag this Insignia 24-inch Fire TV marked down to just $99.99 (was $169.99). See more of the 20 best Prime Day deals below, and keep in mind, all of the devices from today's sale are down to record-low prices and these offers will end at tomorrow at midnight PST. You must have a Prime membership to take advantage of these bargains, and you can sign up for a 30-day free trial here, which will take you through the upcoming Amazon Prime Day sale and beyond.

See more Amazon device deals with our roundup of the best Prime Day Echo deals and the best Prime Day Kindle deals. You can also see more cheap home security camera sales and deals and the best Ring Video Doorbell sales and deals. You can also see the best 4th of July sales from Best Buy, Home Depot, Lowe's, and more.
